Title: Establishes the class C felony offense of assault on a school employee
Summary: Establishes the class C felony offense of assault on a school employee for the intentional causing of physical injury to a school employee while upon school grounds.
LawCode: Add ยง120.00-a, amd ยง120.05, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the offense of assault on a school employee
